A

addStock() - Method in interface controller.PortfolioController
Method that adds a stock into a portfolio.
addStock() - Method in class controller.PortfolioControllerImpl
Method that is used to map the stocks to the model using a hashmap.Also tells the user that the stock was added successfully, it is currently in draft.
addStockInPortfolio(StocksImpl) - Method in interface model.Portfolio
Method used to add stock to the portfolio.
addStockInPortfolio(StocksImpl) - Method in class model.PortfolioImpl
Method used to add stock to the portfolio.
addStockToPortfolio(Object) - Method in interface controller.StockController
Method used to take the quantity of stocks to be added to the portfolio.
addStockToPortfolio(Object) - Method in class controller.StockControllerImpl
Method used to take the quantity of stocks to be added to the portfolio.
afterAddingStock(PortfolioImpl) - Method in interface controller.PortfolioController
Method used to write into portfolio after adding a stock.
afterAddingStock(PortfolioImpl) - Method in class controller.PortfolioControllerImpl
Method that takes a confirmation from the user and saves the stocks into the portfolio.It also provides an option for the user to add a new stock after adding one and saving it.
afterStocksDisplay(Object) - Method in interface controller.StockController
Method used to display the options after selecting a stock.
afterStocksDisplay(Object) - Method in class controller.StockControllerImpl
Method used to display the options after selecting a stock.
append(String) - Static method in class model.Output
Method used to append the string to the output.
appendNewLine() - Static method in class model.Output
Method used to append a new line to the output.
